item.description:
Hello Everyone -

I thought we could try a fun winter activity like snow mobiling. Never been, no problem. We'll have instruction and our own guide. Our guided tour will take us through a Bog through the White Mountains that proves to be not only fun and exciting but very picturesque.  It's a two hour tour and cost includes all the gear you'll need for $149.

Sled Ventures is just a quick 2 hour trip North of Boston where I was going to look into accommodations for those who wish to spend the night too.  Your not obligated to spend the night but those wishing to, please note in your RSVP.

Try it out, it's a great way to spend the day. Come have fun in the snow with us ;-)

Susan

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Snow Mobiling Anyone????
